pages.title: PSB-2042-07
pages.text: $(bold)ORSA PUBLIC SAFETY BULLETIN$()$(br)Prepared by: ORSA Wellness Division$(br2)$(italic)"Staying Safe in a Changing Climate!"$()$(br2)This bulletin contains important information for your family's continued comfort and well-being.

pages.title: Winter Preparation Tips
pages.text: With extended cold seasons, ORSA recommends the following:$(br2)$(li)Insulate your home with available materials$(li)Stockpile fuel sources$(li)Maintain indoor heating at all times$(li)Seal windows and doors$(br2)Remember: a warm home is a happy home!

pages.title: Thermal Shelter Guidelines
pages.text: For optimal survival — we mean $(bold)COMFORT$() — ORSA Engineering has developed Thermal Heater technology.$(br2)Place heaters indoors. Multiple heaters can be used for larger spaces.$(br2)NOTE: Do not exceed the recommended number of heat sources per room.$(br2)$(italic)(There is no recommended number. We forgot to calculate one.)$()

pages.title: Community Resilience
pages.text: In these challenging times, communities that work together thrive together!$(br2)Consider organizing:$(br)$(li)Shared resource pools$(li)Neighborhood watch teams$(li)Group sheltering programs$(li)Skill-sharing workshops$(br2)$(italic)NOTE: If your community has been fully evacuated, this section may not apply.$()

pages.title: Frequently Asked Questions
pages.text: $(bold)Q:$() When will this end?$(br)$(bold)A:$() ORSA is monitoring the situation closely.$(br2)$(bold)Q:$() Can the orbit be fixed?$(br)$(bold)A:$() ORSA is exploring all available options.$(br2)$(bold)Q:$() Should I evacuate?$(br)$(bold)A:$() Please contact your local ORSA representative.$(br2)$(bold)Q:$() Who is Kevin?$(br)$(bold)A:$() See next page.

pages.title: Who is Kevin?
pages.text: Kevin is a member of ORSA's Logistics Division who volunteered for surface sweep operations during Project Exodus.$(br2)Kevin chose not to board the final evacuation shuttle.$(br2)Kevin is believed to still be conducting sweeps.$(br2)If you encounter Kevin, please tell him the shuttle already left.$(br2)$(italic)We would very much like Kevin to stop.$()
